duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide first-line customer support by assisting shoppers, answering questions, locating merchandise, and assisting with the check-out process.
Stock and display merchandise in accordance with company merchandising standards.
Unloading and sorting merchandise upon delivery arrival.
Perform cleaning assignments and ensure shopping carts are ready for arriving customers.
Report any illegal activity by customers or employees to Store Management.
Work independently with minimal direction and follow the daily to-do list.
Perform additional duties as assigned by Management or Supervisors.
